walmart.cashier_note: Match identical item (brand, size, model). Verify current price on a Canadian retailer. Must be in stock at the competitor.
bullets: Competing offer must be current and verifiable online.
Local Canadian retailers only; marketplace sellers usually excluded.

bestbuy.cashier_note: Match advertised price for identical model from a major Canadian retailer; exclude marketplace sellers.
bullets: Canadian retailer with the item in stock.
Excludes third-party marketplace and clearance anomalies.

homedepot.cashier_note: Match identical item; verify price and availability from Canadian competitors.
bullets: Offer must be current and available for purchase.
Proof required: show the live web page or flyer.

loblaws.cashier_note: Grocery match typically requires identical item and active flyer/online price; check store manager guidance.
bullets: Current flyer or online price within valid dates.

nofrills.cashier_note: Policy varies by location; show competitor flyer with valid dates for the identical item.
bullets: Exclusions may apply; ask customer service.

rcss.cashier_note: Verify identical item and flyer dates for Real Canadian Superstore price match.
bullets: Show current flyer or online listing.
